50.eng-name: The Book of Seeking Refuge with Allah

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah said:"He (meaning the Prophet [SAW]) said: 'Seek refuge with Allah from five things: From the torment of Hell, the torment of the grave, the trials of life and death, and the tribulation of Al-Masihid-Dajjal

chapter.eng-name: Seeking Refuge from the Trials of Life
